parameters.name: paymentStopId
parameters.description: The identifier of the payment stop request

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: paymentStopId
parameters.description: The identifier of the payment stop request

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

firstChequeId.description: Identifies the first chequeId in a range or, if lastChequeId is not entered, then only chequeId which is being stopped.

lastChequeId.description: Identifies the last chequeId in a range that is being stopped.

chequeTypeId.description: The identifier of the cheque type

stopDate.description: The date on which the Payment Stop is placed

amountFrom.description: Specifies the amount from used in selection

amountTo.description: Specific the amount to used in selection

waiveCharge.description: Defines whether charges are to be collected or waived

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

overrides.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

override.description: Records the override messages generated during processing of an activity.

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

recordStatus.description: The status of the record processed

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
